lead_paragraph: Alfred Olango, 38, killed in the San Diego suburb after he pointed a vape pen at a police officer, was twice refused re-entry by his native Uganda.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Tried to Deport Victim in California Police Shooting
headline.main: U.S. Tried Twice to Deport El Cajon Shooting Victim, to No Avail

snippet: Alfred Olango, 38, killed in the San Diego suburb after he pointed a vape pen at a police officer, was twice refused re-entry by his native Uganda....
abstract: Immigration and Customs Enforcement officials say they tried twice to deport Alfred Olango, man fatally shot by police in El Cajon, Calif, but his native country refused to take him; Olongo had been arrested several times on drug and weapons charges since coming to United States as refugee from Uganda.
